name: National League of Local Councils and National Association of Capital and Provincial Councils
goal: The National League of Local Councils (NLC) and the National Association of Capital and Provincial Councils (NACPC) are local government associations which represents sub-national councils in the Kingdom of Cambodia. Our goals are to advocate for the interests of sub-national councils, provide capacity building to sub-national councilors and promote their status. In order achieve these goals, NLC and NACP have been working closely with various development partners such as EU and UNDP, AIMF, KAF, GIZ and FCM to support activities implemented for the interests of local councils in Cambodia. NLC and NACPC also involves various regional activities of UCLG ASPAC to exchange experience among local councilors.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trade, Youth
